display_long_description:
Car Drift Battle Racing  a VR Shooting and Fighting Adventure is the ultimate blend of high-speed racing, explosive car battles, and intense shooting action. Step into a chaotic world where your driving skills, shooting accuracy, and combat strategies are all put to the test. Customize your vehicles with deadly weapons like machine guns, rocket launchers, and mines to dominate the battlefield. Whether it’s outmaneuvering rivals or destroying opponents with precision, only the best racers and fighters can survive.

Two Thrilling Game Modes:

Straight Path Challenge: Race through fast-paced tracks filled with daring stunts, explosive obstacles, and relentless enemies. Out speed and outgun your opponents in a race for survival and be the last car standing at the finish line.
City Battleground: Navigate a vibrant urban environment. Strategize your routes, utilize the cityscape, and unleash your arsenal to outfight and outshoot your competitors in a thrilling street race.
Unlock and upgrade an array of customizable vehicles as you progress. Enhance your car’s speed, durability, and firepower with powerful weapons designed for VR racing combat. Rendered environments where stunts, destruction, and high-stakes battles await at every corner. Fight through waves of enemies cars, where racing, fighting, and shooting define survival.

Multiplayer mode is coming soon to Car Drift Battle Racing!
Compete against real players in fast paced VR drift racing battles, test your driving skills.
